subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brian Matusz, whose 10.69 earned run average last season was the highest in history for a pitcher with at least 10 starts, trained under Brady Anderson in the off-season to get stronger.
snippet: Brian Matusz, whose 10.69 earned run average last season was the highest in history for a pitcher with at least 10 starts, trained under Brady Anderson in the off-season to get stronger.
